segments.text: Good morning.Are you through with the cleaning ? If not , we'll come back a little later .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Never mind , come right in . I've almost finished.You always keep the room neat and tidy , I must say.It saves me a lot of work , but you should let me do it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It doesn't take much time . I ' m used to tidying up my room myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's very considerate of you to do so.Do you have any laundry today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a suit that needs cleaning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me have it , please . I'm taking some laundry downstairs anyway .
segments.speaker: S1
